findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to stop or pause transactions
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to stop or pause transactions.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to transfer tokens from a specific address.

findings.title: Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to massively stop contacts from transactions and may take advantage of it by calling the manage_blacklist function.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: The contract owner has limited authority to increase fees beyond 25%

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent
findings.description: The contract owner has limited authority to increase liquidity taken by dev wallet beyond a certain percentage.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to mint new tokens.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to burn tokens from specific wallet
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the capability to burn tokens from a specific wallet.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to blacklist wallets from selling
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to massively stop contacts from transactions but lacks the ability to blacklist wallets from selling.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: There are variables that are defined in the local scope and are not initialized.

findings.title: Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to massively stop contacts from transactions.
